net.amoebaman.utils
Enum ParticleEffect

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<ParticleEffect>
      net.amoebaman.utils.ParticleEffect
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ParticleEffect>
public enum ParticleEffect
extends java.lang.Enum<ParticleEffect>

Contains an enumeration of all available particle effects, and methods for sending them to players via packets.

Author:
AmoebaMan

play

public void play(org.bukkit.entity.Player p,
                 org.bukkit.Location loc,
                 float offsetX,
                 float offsetY,
                 float offsetZ,
                 float speed,
                 int amount)
Sends this particle effect to a specific player.

Parameters:
p - a player
loc - a location
offsetX - the maximum random x offset
offsetY - the maximum random y offset
offsetZ - the maximum random z offset
speed - the speed of the effect
amount - the amount of particles
